com.mobius.vdrapi
Class TopicItemEntryNode

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.ListFactoryNode
        |
        +--com.mobius.vdrapi.TopicItemEntryNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHasAlternateNode, com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasAlternateSectionData, com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasConnectionState, IHasDescription, com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasInfoForCreatingPages, IHasSectionInfo, IHasTopicItemEntryInfo, IListFactory, INode
public class TopicItemEntryNode
extends ListFactoryNode
implements com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasInfoForCreatingPages, IHasTopicItemEntryInfo, IHasAlternateNode, com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasAlternateSectionData, IHasDescription

A TopicItemEntryNode object represents a single topic item entry, and is created by a TopicVersionNode.

Method Summary

          Returns the physical page number in the original report - namely, the report from which the report archive was created, and to which the topic item refers.

          Returns the page RBA number for the first page in the topic item.

getNormalizedPageNumber

public int getNormalizedPageNumber(int relativePageNumber)
                            throws ViewDirectException
